title: Methodology Design for Selecting LMS Platforms in Corporate Mathematics Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Mathematical Concepts and Online Learning Experience
context.additional_context: Supporting large-scale mathematics job training in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.

learning_goals: Learners can derive ten LMS evaluation criteria aligned with mathematics education objectives.
Learners can design an LMS selection process considering institutional technological infrastructure and BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environments.
Learners can evaluate LMS features (e.g., equation editors, graphing tools) suitable for the characteristics of mathematics content.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
